# applicationShouldRequestHealthAuthorization(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when your app should ask the user for access to his or her HealthKit data.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func applicationShouldRequestHealthAuthorization(_ application: UIApplication)
```

## Parameters

- **application**: Your singleton app object.

## Discussion

In your implementation of this method, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/HealthKit/HKHealthStore/handleAuthorizationForExtension(completion:)] method of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/HealthKit/HKHealthStore] object.
